title: A New Font Web Site !
content:
very nice web site,   
and very good typographies!   
   
I give you a new fonts web site with free downloads   
 [http://typo.gras.free.fr/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107165024/http:/typo.gras.free.fr/)   
   
i hope future collaboration!   
enjoy,   
keyman
author: anonymous

comments.content:
what the sh\*t?   
   
if I wasn't epileptic before, I am now because I think I just had a seizure.

**trés cool** though! some nice fonts...   
(how do you do a _grave_ accent on a mac? :| )

What a funky site!   
9ibb9/Rococo is way nice.   
   
hhp

Very fun. I'm especially font of 9ibb9's stuff.   
See a little review at [Typographica](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107165024/http:/typographi.ca/2002_10_31.php#000386).
